properties.entry: SELECT REVIEW_NO , REST_NO , NICKNAME , REVIEW_CONT , TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS formatted_date "REVIEW_DATE" , REVIEW_LIKE , REVIEW_DISLIKE , RATE_TASTE , RATE_PRICE , RATE_SERVICE FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = REVIEW_WRITER) WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' AND REST_NO = ?
